data.actual_result: The app crashes after a few seconds
data.expected_result: You should return to the Server Settings
data.short_description: App crashes when the back button is pressed while moving a channel
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server which has more than 2 channels, make sure you have the Manage Channels permission - Go to Server Settings > Channels - Move a channel and keep your finger on it then press the back button located in the top left corner of your screen - Wait for the app to crash
